45 class PublishLandmarks
46 {
47 public:
48  PublishLandmarks(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
49  {
50 
51  aruco_sub_ = nh.subscribe("stereo_pair/markers", 100, &PublishLandmarks::calculateArucoPosition, this);
52  odom_sub_ = nh.subscribe("odom", 100, &PublishLandmarks::currentPosition, this);
53 
54  landmark_pub_ = nh.advertise<ekf_slam::LandmarksMap>("landmarks", 100, true);
55  odom_pub_ = nh.advertise<ekf_slam::LandmarksMap>("robot_path", 100, true);
56 
57  threshold_ = 0.01;
58  size_ = 0.3;
59  odom_marker_size_ = 0.2;
60  odom_marker_size_threshold_ = 0.1;
61  land_map_threshold_ = 0.3;
62  }
63 
64  template <typename T>
65  bool contains(std::vector<T> vec, const T &elem)
66  {
67  bool result = false;
68  if (find(vec.begin(), vec.end(), elem) != vec.end())
69  {
70  result = true;
71  }
72  return result;
73  }
74 
75  int getIndex(std::vector<int64_t> v, int K)
76  {
77  auto it = std::find(v.begin(), v.end(), K);
78  int index = it - v.begin();
79  return index;
80  }

91  void calculateArucoPosition(const cares_msgs::ArucoMarkers::ConstPtr &aruco_marker)
92  {
93  if (!aruco_marker->marker_ids.empty())
94  {
95  for (auto pose : aruco_marker->marker_poses)
96  {
97  int i = 0;
98  double z = pose.position.z;
99  geometry_msgs::Pose2D pose2d;
100  pose2d.x = pose.position.x;
101  pose2d.y = pose.position.y;
102 
103  tf::Quaternion q(
104  pose.orientation.x,
105  pose.orientation.y,
106  pose.orientation.z,
107  pose.orientation.w);
108 
109  tf::Matrix3x3 m(q);
110  double roll, pitch, yaw;
111  m.getEulerYPR(yaw, pitch, roll);
112 
113  pose2d.theta = yaw;
114 
115  std::cout << std::endl
116  << "Aruco marker pose from stereo_pair:" << std::endl
117  << std::endl;
118  std::cout << "Position X: " << pose2d.x << std::endl;
119  std::cout << "Position Y: " << pose2d.y << std::endl;
120  std::cout << "Position Z: " << z << std::endl;
121  std::cout << "Position theta: " << pose2d.theta << std::endl;
122 
123  if (current_position_.size() > 0)
124  {
125  // double theta_sum = pose2d.theta + current_position_(2);
126  // double xw = (pose.position.x * cos(theta_sum)) - (pose.position.z * sin(theta_sum) + pose.position.x);
127  // double yw = (pose.position.z * cos(theta_sum)) - (pose.position.x * sin(theta_sum) + pose.position.y);
128 
129  // Without xz and yz
130  double theta_sum = pose2d.theta + current_position_(2);
131  double xw = (pose.position.x * cos(theta_sum)) - (pose.position.z * sin(theta_sum));
132  double yw = (pose.position.z * cos(theta_sum)) - (pose.position.x * sin(theta_sum));
133 
134  // double xw = (pose.position.x * cos(pose2d.theta)) - (z * sin(pose2d.theta));
135  // double yw = (z * cos(pose2d.theta)) - (pose.position.x * sin(pose2d.theta));
136 
137  landmark_position_(0) = current_position_(0) + xw;
138  landmark_position_(1) = current_position_(1) + yw;
139  landmark_position_(2) = current_position_(2) + pose2d.theta;
140 
141  std::cout << std::endl
142  << "landmark detected id:" << aruco_marker->marker_ids[i] << std::endl
143  << std::endl;
144  std::cout << "Position Xw: " << xw << std::endl;
145  std::cout << "Position Yw: " << yw << std::endl
146  << std::endl;
147  std::cout << "Position X: " << landmark_position_(0) << std::endl;
148  std::cout << "Position Y: " << landmark_position_(1) << std::endl;
149  std::cout << "Position theta: " << landmark_position_(2) << std::endl;
150 
151  std::cout << std::endl
152  << "Odom position:" << std::endl
153  << std::endl;
154  std::cout << "Position Xw: " << current_position_(0) << std::endl;
155  std::cout << "Position Yw: " << current_position_(1) << std::endl;
156  std::cout << "Position theta: " << current_position_(2) << std::endl;

187  // // marker_ids_.push_back(aruco_marker->marker_ids[i]);
188  // }
189  // }
190

192  else if (!contains(marker_ids_, aruco_marker->marker_ids[i]))
193  {
194  land_map_.id.emplace_back(aruco_marker->marker_ids[i]);
195  land_map_.x.emplace_back(landmark_position_(0));

197  land_map_.size.emplace_back(size_);

207  land_map_.x[ind] = landmark_position_(0);
208  land_map_.y[ind] = landmark_position_(1);
209  land_map_.size[ind] = size_;
210  land_map_.map[ind] = 1;
211  landmark_pub_.publish(land_map_);

295 
297  void currentPosition(const nav_msgs::Odometry::ConstPtr &msg)
298  {
299  geometry_msgs::Pose2D pose2d;
300  pose2d.x = msg->pose.pose.position.x;
301  pose2d.y = msg->pose.pose.position.y;
302 
303  tf::Quaternion q(
304  msg->pose.pose.orientation.x,
305  msg->pose.pose.orientation.y,
306  msg->pose.pose.orientation.z,
307  msg->pose.pose.orientation.w);
308 
309  tf::Matrix3x3 m(q);
310  double yaw, pitch, roll;
311  m.getEulerYPR(yaw, pitch, roll);
312  // Get the matrix represented as euler angles around YXZ, roundtrip with setEulerYPR.
313  // yaw Yaw around Z axis
314  // pitch Pitch around Y axis
315  // roll around X axis
316 
317  // pose2d.theta = yaw;
318  pose2d.theta = pitch;
319 
320  // std::cout << "Theta at odom level: " << pose2d.theta << std::endl;
321 
322  current_position_(0) = pose2d.y;
323  current_position_(1) = pose2d.x;
324  current_position_(2) = pose2d.theta;
325 
326  if (robot_path_.id.empty())
327  {
328  robot_path_.id.emplace_back(odom_id_);
329  robot_path_.x.emplace_back(current_position_(0));
330  robot_path_.y.emplace_back(current_position_(1));
331  robot_path_.size.emplace_back(odom_marker_size_);
332  robot_path_.map.emplace_back(2);
333 
334  odom_pub_.publish(robot_path_);
335 
336  odom_id_++;
337  }
338  else if ((fabs(current_position_(0) - robot_path_.x.back()) > odom_marker_size_threshold_) ||
339  (fabs(current_position_(1) - robot_path_.y.back()) > odom_marker_size_threshold_))
340  {
341  robot_path_.id.emplace_back(odom_id_);
342  robot_path_.x.emplace_back(current_position_(0));
343  robot_path_.y.emplace_back(current_position_(1));
344  robot_path_.size.emplace_back(odom_marker_size_);
345  robot_path_.map.emplace_back(2);
346 
347  odom_pub_.publish(robot_path_);
348 
349  odom_id_++;
350  }
351  }
352 
353 private:
354  ros::Publisher landmark_pub_;
355  ros::Publisher odom_pub_;
356  ros::Subscriber aruco_sub_;
357  ros::Subscriber odom_sub_;
358  Eigen::Vector3d current_position_;
359  Eigen::Vector3d landmark_position_;
360  ekf_slam::LandmarksMap land_map_;
361  ekf_slam::LandmarksMap robot_path_;
362 
363  int odom_id_ = 0;
364 
365  std::vector<int> marker_ids_;
366  std::string publish_frame_;
367  std::string what_map_;
368  double threshold_;
369  double odom_marker_size_;
370  double odom_marker_size_threshold_;
371  double land_map_threshold_;
372  double size_;
373 };
374 
375 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
376 {
377  // Initializing ROS node - This must be called before anything else ROS-related
378  ros::init(argc, argv, "slam_control_node");
379  // Create a ROS node handle
380  ros::NodeHandle nh;
381 
382  PublishLandmarks pl = PublishLandmarks(nh);
383 
384  // ros::Rate rate(5);
385 
386  // while (ros::ok())
387  // {
388  // rate.sleep();
389  // }
390 
391  // Don't exit the program.
392  // In this application all user callbacks will be called from within the ros::spin() call.
393  // ros::spin() will not return until the node has been shutdown, either through a call to ros::shutdown() or a Ctrl-C.
394  ros::spin();
395  return 0;
396 }
